text: The 1935 Tour de Hongrie was the 10th edition of the Tour de Hongrie cycle race and was held from 26 to 30 June 1935. The race started and finished in Budapest. The race was won by Károly Németh. ==Route== {| class="wikitable" |+ Stages of the 1935 Tour de Hongrie |- ! scope="col" | Stage ! scope="col" | Date ! scope="col" | Route ! scope="col" | Distance ! scope="col" | Winner |- ! scope="col" | 1 | style="text-align:right;" | 26 June | Budapest to Eger | | |- ! scope="col" | 2 | style="text-align:right;" | 27 June | Eger to Békéscsaba | | |- ! scope="col" | 3 | style="text-align:right;" | 28 June | Békéscsaba to Budapest | | |- ! scope="col" | 4 | style="text-align:right;" | 29 June | Budapest to Kaposvár | | |- ! scope="col" | 5 | style="text- align:right;" | 30 June | Kaposvár to Budapest | | |- | colspan="3" style="text-align:center" | Total | colspan="2" style="text-align:center" | '''''' |} ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Team ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | BSE | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | Hungary (national team) | style="text-align:right;" | + 9' 51" |- | style="text- align:center;" | 3 | | Székesfehérvári MÁV Előre | style="text-align:right;" | + 10' 47" |} |} ==References== 1935 Tour de Hongrie Tour de Hongrie
